website_summaries.verdict: The Zoot Laguna is a reliable training shoe. Some reviewers are happy with this shoe because it is very comfortable and durable. It provides a secure fit and good arch support.
pros: The lightweight, breathable mesh upper of the Zoot Laguna provides comfort
The bare-fit internal liner technology for a sock-like feel gained several thumbs-up from runners
The Laguna features a minimal carbon rubber pods, providing better grip in the toe and heel
The overall construction and durability features of the shoe were applauded by most runners
The design is impressive as noted in some reviews
cons: Some observed that the Zoot Laguna is a bit heavy for long-distance runs
Some noticed that this shoe needs more cushioning

customer_reviews.title: a good deal. Mine are a little too short
customer_reviews.text: for the price, a good deal. Mine are a little too short, as I ordered 10.5 M instead of my actual size of 11 N, because they didn't have 11 N available. But they fit exactly like a 10.5 M shoe usually fits me, just barely too short and just barely too wide. So I would say their sizing is spot on. They are also not white or gray, which pleases me because for many years the only shoes that fit me were white or gray.
customer_reviews.author: kaja

customer_reviews.title: nice lightweight sneaker- sneakers came immediately- Take a size 7 ...
customer_reviews.text: Zoots Women Running Laguna Sneaker Review: nice lightweight sneaker- sneakers came immediately- Take a size 7 women- these were more like a size 6.5. Bottom will wear out quickly. Nice breathable sneaker, that washes well- not much arch support, but a snug sneaker that will let you run well- just order up a half size.
customer_reviews.author: kirsten

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Like the shoe color, light weight, decent comfort, but toe box is small. I bought a larger shoe to accommodate my orthotic which didn't work either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Always light weight
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are light weight and great feeling. I switch out the shoe strings to tieless strings, and wish they came with tieless. Been buying these shoes for years, couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.author: BJB

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: i wear a small 7.5 and could wear these but they were snug
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about these shoes. They did not come with an excessive arch support. I purchased the small, gel ones from Dr. Scholl's, and that solved the problem. Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: DD Lorenzo, Author

customer_reviews.title: They are the best
customer_reviews.text: Their is no way that there is a negative to Zoot shoes. They are dynamite. I have three pair and I wouldn’t trade them for a thing. They are comfortable cute and I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! Great for speed work and training runs. :)
customer_reviews.author: LUV2SHOP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I only wear zoot running shoes. This is exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.author: laura oldread

customer_reviews.title: They were amazing for the low price I got them on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: DD likes them and uses them for workouts. They were amazing for the low price I got them on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: DrivertheMom

customer_reviews.title: Great Zoot Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Zoot reputation for quality athletic shoes always bring us back for more.
customer_reviews.author: CMG

customer_reviews.title: Best Runners Ever
customer_reviews.text: best runners ever. very light weight but provide excellent support and cushion. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

product_meta.title: Zoot Women Triathlon Running Shoe Laguna Color Punch/Grey W Laguna - Punch/Grey 37,5
product_meta.description: Lightweight with the right touch of support, welcome the laguna to the zoot family! Step into the guidance shoe with a breathable mesh upper combining seamless 3d printing, barefit internal lining for a sock like feel and internal reinforcement for a great fit and support without adding weight. The midsole combines interlocking parts of z-bound+ and zva as well as an internal medial support to gently guide you to smooth long lasting cushion. With minimal carbon rubber pods, added traction in the heel and toe, your body will feel comfortable and natural in every stride. 8mm drop. 8.2 oz.
feature_bullets: Upper: Light weight breathable mesh with seamless no-sew upper with internal reinforcement creates great fit and support without adding weight. BareFit internal liner for a sock like feel.
Outsole: A lightweight but supportive outsole combining
